title: $timi Check$, Jennifer Lopez, MTH, Aretha Franklin and more.
itunes:title: $timi Check$, Jennifer Lopez, MTH, Aretha Franklin and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve has a mask story that he says in his white guy voice. The Chief Love Officer gets a letter from a wife that has a problem with a side baby situation. Jennifer Lopez proves that she wears the pants in the relationship. Fool #2 murders another one just for the cussers out there. The crew talk about $timi check shopping. Prime Time Deion Sanders puts more eyes on Jackson State Football. The fellas give us the nicest ways to tell a Christian off. 'Genius: Aretha' will debut on Sunday and it is a bio series about Aretha Franklin. Today the show wraps up with Steve talking about the scab that has been on top of America for a long time.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
